## TransactableProtocol.stakeUniTokens() method

Stake Uniswap FIL/DebtToken LP tokens to participate in liquidity mining and earn ProtocolToken.

**Signature:**

```typescript
stakeUniTokens(amount: Decimalish): Promise<void>;
```
